statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureRole)<-[:ASSUME_ROLE]-(m)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND (n)-[:HAS_ACCESS]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (ar:AzureRole)<-[r:ASSUME_ROLE]-(m)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND (ar)-[:HAS_ACCESS]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureRole)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureRole)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
